Title: Unyielding Fists: Trial of Bamboo
Description:
We will start with a test: The Trial of Bamboo.

Your friend Lin failed this test.

Follow me, and listen carefully to my instructions.
ObjectivesText: Speak with Master Bruised Paw, then successfully strike the Stack of Bamboo Reeds 3 times.
CompletionText: If you cannot pass this test, then there is probably no reason to continue our training.
RewardText:
You show promise, $n. We will continue.

It is now time for your first round of training.

Objectives.Text: Strike the Stack of Bamboo Reeds
